DataSourcePortable.Name: Dashboard Comercial - Falta faturar
DataSourcePortable.Content:
<DataSourceDefinition> <FromSql Alias="A" SelectCommand="SELECT COUNT(PES.NOME) QTD,
 PES.NOME,
 PES.CGCCPF CNPJ,
 DASHITEM.DASHBOARD,
 DASHITEM.TIPO,
 SUM(DASHITEM.VALOR) VALORFATURADO
 FROM CM_DWDASHBOARDCOMERCIALITENS DASHITEM
 INNER JOIN GN_PESSOAS PES ON(PES.HANDLE = DASHITEM.PESSOA)
 WHERE DASHITEM.EMPRESA = @EMPRESA
 GROUP BY PES.NOME,
 PES.CGCCPF,
 DASHITEM.DASHBOARD,
 DASHITEM.TIPO" /> <Fields> <Field Alias="QTD" From="A" Path="QTD" /> <Field Alias="NOME" From="A" Path="NOME" /> <Field Alias="CNPJ" From="A" Path="CNPJ" /> <Field Alias="DASHBOARD" From="A" Path="DASHBOARD" /> <Field Alias="TIPO" From="A" Path="TIPO" /> <Field Alias="VALORFATURADO" From="A" Path="VALORFATURADO" /> </Fields> </DataSourceDefinition>
